in je vakgebied, werken in een omgeving die nooit stil staat Dat is werken bij Visma  Raet, , Binnen Visma  Raet als organisatie is BPO een belangrijk onderdeel Een groot aantal klanten vertrouwt hun HR en Payroll administratie aan ons toe Excellente en efficinte dienstverlening met gebruikmaking van de door ons als marktleider zelf ontwikkelde software en services staan hierbij voorop In Amsterdam zoeken wij een Business Analist die ons gaat helpen onze klanten verder te laten groeien in hun bedrijfsdoelstellingen, , Werken als Business Analist bij Visma  Raet betekent werken met 300 collega HR en Payroll Professionals en gelieerde ITprofessionals binnen het bedrijfsonderdeel BPO, , , , Het vak van Business Analist kent voor jou geen geheimen en je beseft dat onze corporate klanten het uiterste van ons vragen op het gebied van HR, Payroll en Organisatievraagstukken Van jou als professional verwachten wij een proactieve bijdrage in het continue verbeteren van de interne  externe processen van onze klanten, gevraagd en ongevraagd, , In je rol als contactpersoon weet je als deskundige onze klanten te adviseren en mee te nemen in de moderne oplossingen die ons portfolio biedt Dit betekent dat je beschikt over een commercieel gevoel, kennis van HR  Payroll, empathisch vermogen en overtuigingskracht, , Als Business Analist werk je aan nieuwe processen, changes van bestaande processen en continue verbetering hiervan Dit betekent dat je verantwoordelijk bent voor de analyse en realisatie van changes in de processen van onze klanten die nooit stilstaan, , Je beschikt hiervoor over eigenschappen als organisatietalent, aanjager, creativiteit en je hebt het vermogen om snel kennis op te doen van systemen, processen en bedrijfsmodellen Je bent een representatief persoon die graag een Business Analist rol vervult waarbij je oplossingen biedt voor complexe vraagstukken voor corporate klanten Je maakt deel uit van het team BPO Support en rapporteert aan Teammanager BPO Projecten  Support, , , , We bieden je een uitdagende en dynamische omgeving Je kunt veel leren van je collegas, die net zo professioneel en ambitieus zijn als jij En heb je een goed idee Zie je iets dat volgens jou beter kan Als jij enthousiast bent en een goede onderbouwing kan geven dan wordt jouw initiatief gewaardeerd en beloond, , , , Je bent bovenmatig deskundig, proactief, gedreven, betrouwbaar en je kunt uitstekend samenwerken, multitasken en werken met deadlines Je bent een Business Analist die op slimme en deskundige wijze klanten verder helpt bij de integratie van onze software en services, , , , , , , , , , , , We vragen veel van je, maar daar staat tegenover dat je bij Visma  Raet stappen kunt maken in je ontwikkeling en carrire De BPO markt is flink in beweging en op zoek naar vernieuwingen Naast je inzet van je opgedane ervaring en competenties kun je jouw vaardigheden verder ontwikkelen en veel kennis opdoen van moderne HR  Payroll Oplossingen Je werkt tenslotte bij de vernieuwer en marktleider op dit gebied in Nederland, , , , Rechtsboven zit de knop der knoppen Wil je eerst nog wat meer weten Bel of app dan met Denise zonder tussenkomst van externe bureaus

Under Armour has one mission to make you better We have a commitment to innovation that lies at the heart of everything we do, not just for our athletes but also for our teammates As a global organization, our teams around the world push boundaries and think beyond what is expected Together our teammates are unified by our values and are grounded in our vision to inspire you with performance solutions you never knew you needed but cant imagine living without, , , , , , Under Armour is looking for a Marketplaces Operations Professional for our growing European Digital Revenue business The Marketplaces Operations Professional is responsible to innovate how Under Armour operates in the everchanging online marketplaces environment through development and implementation of new capabilities in partnership with accounts, Under Armour Digital Revenue and our supply chain teams, , This role will focus on operating the rapidly growing daily business of selling Under Armour gear on different marketplaces including but not limited to Zalando, JD Sports and About You The Marketplaces Operations Professional will be the contact for the operational counterpart at the various marketplaces and will work closely together with logistics, ecommerce and customer service teams Responsibilities will vary from activating product, improving product content, monitoring and acting on issues in the daily order flow This position requires a motivated team player part of a proactive, responsive and customer focused team The right candidate knows about logistical processes and possesses problemsolving skills, strong product feed understanding and the ability to identify issues and improve operational excellence, , Essential Duties and Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following, , Build a relationship with the operational department of the marketplace accounts, , Read and react to business on a daily basis aiming for the catalog optimization including but not limited to implementing changes to product titles, descriptions, pricing, , Support the flow of products content, images, copy, etc, , to external marketplaces through the enterprise system, including item set up, inclusive of images, copy and other content, , Develop and manage timely and proactive response andor resolution processes with logistics around marketplace issues, , Develop and manage timely and proactive response andor resolution processes with customer service around marketplace issues, , Improve current and implement new and optimized operational processes for efficient channel management, , , , include but are not limited to the following, , Strong analytical skills with the ability to communicate findings to all levels and to translate results into future actions to improve the business, , Results oriented with strong planning, prioritization, problem solving and decisionmaking, organizational and timemanagement skills Works well under pressure and delivers on commitments, , Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and working together with internal and external stakeholders, , Ability to set up new and optimized operational processes for efficient channel management, , Ability to clearly and effectively communicate goals and objectives including level of responsibility, decision making authority, tools and resources, and deadlines, , Experience reviewing and analyzing sales and performing calculations such as retail margin, growth rate, percent change, etc, , Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously working together with internal and external stakeholders, , Strong understanding of the job functions and possesses the knowledge and skills required to perform the required job functions, , Knowledge of the European Sporting Goods Landscape, especially Pure Player and MultiChannel Retailer, , , , Bachelors degree in Business Management andor Supply Chain, , 12 years of ecommerce experience in direct marketplace management including Zalando and Amazon, , 12 years of experience with marketplace engines Tradebyte, Anatwine, , Proficiency in using Excel, MS Word, Windows, Power Point Experience with SAP a plus, , The right candidate has impeccable planning skills and is has experience within an ecommerce environment, , Excellent skills in working together with both internal and external partners, , Strong communicator and team player, , Fluency in English is required another European language is preferred but not essential, , , , include but are not limited to the following, , Team Player  Loves being part of a team, both leading and serving demonstrated deep commitment to colleagues highly effective in a matrix environment, , Humble  Hungry , , Confidence without arrogance driven to continually up their game regardless of prior successes, , Unparalleled Integrity , , In good times and bad, lives the UA Way takes ownership for mistakes delivers tough messages directly doesnt applications and tools, innovation, recruitment and other HR topics In your team you will work with application administrators and business information managers They work for our European brands and are now looking for our first analyst who will join us on our exiting journey, , If it werent for Covid19, you would be working from our vibrant and lively headquarters in Zaandam At the moment your Atlassian is continuing to hire with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to COVID19 All new and existing Atlassians will continue to work from home until its safe to return to our offices When our offices reopen, every Atlassian will have the choice to work from an office or from home, , Are you passionate about working with smart teams and customers to deliver a white glove customer experience Then this role will be a good match for you This role is part of the Support team which is focused on providing the best support and product experience to our customers In this role, you will manage a team of senior experienced support engineers supporting Atlassian products, , , , You are passionate about servicing customers and love people that have a good sense of accountability and quality You are uncomfortable with mediocre, and are always striving to be the change you seek, , , , , , , , , , , , , The team is filled with technical individuals that are excited to be building a new service offering and experience for our customers, , We challenge one another every day and hold ourselves accountable for our work product as well as our customers overall success We all enjoy the interactions with the customers, problemsolving, and actively championing for customers within Atlassian We wake up every morning asking ourselves how we can improve our customers experience, the quality of our product and support system, or our individual weaknesses We feel that through our roles we can positively impact millions of endusers and their experience with Atlassian products, , We believe we can add significant value to the business by listening to the customers experience, translating these into actions, and championing their shortterm issues and longterm needs throughout the organization Our team is open, filled with varied backgrounds and talents, respectful, focused, located around the globe, and is all about providing legendary service to our customers If this sounds interesting to you, apply and become part of our global team of specialists practicing a followthesun methodology with our other offices in Austin, Amsterdam, San Francisco and other offices around the world to provide the best support possible for our top tier customers, , , , Whether you work in an office or a distributed team, Atlassian is highly collaborative and yes, fun To support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge, flexible working options, five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause, an annual allowance to support your learning  growth, unique ShipIt days, a company paid trip after five years and lots more, , , , Creating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here We build tools like Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello to help teams across the world become more nimble, creative, and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at Atlassian From Amsterdam and Austin, to Sydney and San Francisco, were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart At Atlassian, were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive, as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to Unleash the potential of every team , , , , We believe that the unique contributions of all Atlassians is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status, , All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines, , Learn more about Atlassians culture, interviewing flow, and hiring process by checking out our Candidate Resource Hub

Functieomschrijving Applicatie Support Consultant ERP, , Met een team van 100 ervaren collegas is onze klant verantwoordelijk voor de ontwikkeling, implementatie en ondersteuning van ERPSystemen In relatie tot de ERPSystemen levert de klant aanvullend consultancy diensten en ontwikkelen ze web en mobiele applicaties Het is een informele, platte organisatie die zich momenteel volop aan het ontwikkelen is Ter uitbreiding van het bestaande team zijn ze op zoek naar een Applicatie Support Consultant, , Als Applicatie Support Consultant kom je te werken binnen het beheerteam dat momenteel uit 22 collegas bestaat Het team is onderverdeeld in System Engineers, Applicatie Support Consultants en Support Medewerkers Binnen het team ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het analyseren, reproduceren en verhelpen van complexe problemen in relatie tot het ERPSysteem, , Jouw analytische vermogen wordt op de proef gesteld dankzij de verschillende klantomgevingen met ieder hun eigen uitdaging De ontwikkelde ERPSystemen zijn modulair opgebouwd maar kunnen onpremise draaien of als SaaS oplossing afgenomen worden Je houdt bij de analyse van problemen dan ook rekening met de klant specifieke inrichting en koppelingen met andere systemen, , Als Applicatie Support Consultant lever je geen gebruikersondersteuning maar werk je wel veel samen met interne collegas en de ITteams van klanten Je krijgt te maken met problemen in bijvoorbeeld koppelingen, batches en rapportages Je analyseert performance issues en ondersteunt bij de installatie van patches en updates, , Je wordt onthejob opgeleid waarbij je naast de beschikking over een testomgeving en duidelijke documentatie kan rekenen op ondersteuning van ervaren collegas Je wordt uitgedaagd om steeds complexere werkzaamheden op te pakken en zal daarnaast ook veel kennis opdoen van de achterliggende systemen en koppelingen, , , , Een analytische en communicatief vaardige collega die goed in teamverband kan werken Je kan goed luisteren en weet de juiste vragen te stellen om tot de kern van problemen te komen Je hebt gezien de complexiteit van de ERPSystemen bij voorkeur een bedrijfskundige achtergrond aangevuld met ITaffiniteit De opleiding Business IT  Management sluit mooi aan maar we staan open voor alternatieven, , , , Een vaste baan waarin je in de praktijk zal leren welke bijdrage een ERPSysteem levert in de vertaalslag van Business naar IT Je komt terecht binnen een enthousiast team met de mogelijkheid om intern verder te groeien, , , , , Een informele organisatie met ruim 100 medewerkers in dienst Vanuit de vestiging in Amersfoort ontwikkelen ze ERPSystemen en bieden aanvullend een breed scala aan consultancy diensten aan voor de klanten, , Indien je benieuwd bent naar de organisatie achter deze vacaturetekst neem dan vrijblijvend contact op via 0334779337 Wij vertellen jou graag meer over de organisatie, afdelingen en toekomstige collegas zodat jij kan bepalen of dit mogelijk bij jou past

are able to produce a high quality of work They have good verbal and written communication skills that are presentable and display the ability to work with a variety of internal stakeholders They Job Title: Commercial Management (Consumer Healthcare) – Future Leaders Programme, Netherlands – 2021
Job Description: Site Name Netherlands  Amersfoort, Posted Date Nov 2 2020, , Exciting minds with our Future Leaders programme  Commercial management Consumer Healthcare, , in Communications, Strategy, Marketing, Business or Scientific degree PhD, Pharma, etc, , Fluent English written and spoken Dutch written and spoken, , 1st September 2021, , Early 2021, , current valid drivers license, , We recommend you apply as soon as possible, we accept ongoing applications and will close this vacancy once we have enough matching candidates, , , , With over 300 years of innovation, were a scienceled global healthcare company that delivers billions of innovative products each year Join us and help millions of people do more, feel better, live longer, , , , Are you an adaptable graduate whod like to work in a fast paced consumer obsessed environment and improve peoples lives If so, why not join our fastmoving Consumer Healthcare business Here, youll work with household names that are known in more than 100 countries worldwide Youll also have the chance to explore new products, launch innovations quickly  and further our brands using real consumer insight, , , , Over three years, our Future Leaders graduate programme will challenge and support you to grow professionally and personally Youll have three to four stretching rotations within our sales and marketing functions, where youll take on real roles and gain wideranging experience across the Consumer Healthcare Commercial business, , In the sales rotation, youll work in a customerfacing role This will give you an invaluable firsthand insight into how our consumers engage with our products Youll learn about areas including product merchandising, customer education, new product launches, sales planning, forecasting and stock planning If you strive for targets, take responsibility and are great at building relationships, youll thrive in our talented sales team, , In the marketing rotation, expect to work in areas such as shopper marketing and brandcategory management Youll learn about our brands, gather insights into consumer and buyer preferences and understand which factors influence overall sales Therell be the opportunity to work on digital and traditional media campaigns, brand activations and product launches, while learning how we analyse brand performance and optimise consumer engagement All this calls for strong analytical skills, an ability to work crossfunctionally and a good understanding of customers, , As well as sales and marketing, you could experience other areas that will help you to understand how our business operates, , Throughout the programme, youll be part of a diverse, global network of graduates who are sharing similar daily experiences in different parts of the world These peer relationships are a fantastic opportunity to get exposure and inspiration beyond your home market and learn different approaches to your job At the same time, youll explore your leadership potential through training, mentoring and onthejob experience As you improve your sales and marketing skills, youll also build your knowledge of the pharmaceutical industry, , , , All learning follows the 702010 learning principle 70 of your learning takes place on the job, 20 comes from the support of your mentor a senior leader and the remaining 10 is from formal training sessions, , Together with your Line Manager, you will build a development plan to suit our business needs, your talents and ambition, as well as, setting you up for success in your chosen niche Our programme is designed to help you find out where your strengths are and how you can contribute most You might find that you enjoy the dynamic world of sales, or have a passion for marketing Alternatively, you might discover a hidden talent for negotiating great deals with our vendors in procurement or your outstanding planning skills in Supply Chain After you successfully complete our Future Leaders programme, different options and opportunities will be considered, based on your strengths, successes and company needs Its up to you to prove yourself, , , , , , , , Our Future Leaders programme is designed to accelerate the development of graduates who dont have significant previous professional work experience in the area to which they are applying Of course, many graduates who join the programme have worked while studying or after graduation If youve already developed substantial experience working in a professional role in your sector, while you would be able to apply for this programme, you may also want to look at direct entry roles in our businesses, as these may be the best way to build on your existing skills and expertise and develop a career at GSK, , , , , , , Youll find hints, tips and guidance on our recruitment process on our website  httpsbitly39zxyNw, , We have changed the way we recruit in light of the COVID19 pandemic, you can learn more about how our practices have adapted here, , , , We recommend you apply as soon as possible, we accept ongoing applications and will close this vacancy once we have enough matching candidates, , , , , , , , Do you want to play an essential role in ensuring the good reputation of ING, and be in the first line of defense against money laundering and terrorist financing Currently we are looking for a Business Analyst for the Know Your Customer  Adverse Media Screening Team This role has a focus on process design and IT integration, , The Business Analyst BA is a role within a squad The BA plays an important role in the squad on the cooperation between the business and IT part of the squad You support the Product Owner PO and squad with your screening application and KYC process knowledge, ensuring compliancy by design You refine the roadmap and guarantees that the business requirements and nonfunctional requirements are translated to the IT Solution requirements, , Particularly for Screening, we are looking for a BA with affinity with IT Furthermore you are keen to successfully transform complex KYC requests into simple and concise demands Moreover, we look for BAs that are able to work within a multidisciplinary team in a fastmoving, challenging environment, , , , , , , , , , , , , Global Know Your Customer KYC is an organisation within the Global Operations COO domain Our purpose is Enabling people and organisations to use our banking services by ensuring a compliant and competitive KYC ecosystem Through an innovative and transformational approach, financial crimes, such as tax evasion and terrorist financing, are prevented or detected on a global scope, , By integrating all KYC related capabilities into one functionally steered organisation, we support the global implementation and standardisation of the Global KYC Digital Service Platform This Platform consists of processes, enhanced controls, shared solutions and optimised operations processing across all business lines The Platform helps us to achieve a more robust KYC environment that will strongly contribute to INGs overall response towards more stringent regulatory requirements in this area and beyond, , Within this new fast growing agile organisation you will be part of an exciting journey towards truly global standardisation within the domain of KYC You will be involved with the development of state of the art solutions on socially relevant topics such as AntiMoney Laundering, Counter Terrorism Financing, Fraud, Sanctions and their global implementation across 40 countries, affecting 36 million ING customers Through this, we will be able to deliver our customers an optimal KYC experience, whilst remaining compliant and in control of our risks and processes on a global scale You will be in contact with market leading vendors and thought leaders in their respective domains As such, you will be working with many colleagues from different disciplines, geographies and backgrounds, , The Tribe consists of squads, which are built from highperforming teams consisting of analysts and scripters Squads are selfsteering, autonomous, multidisciplinary teams with a fixed mission and purpose and take the full responsibility and ownership of endtoend processes Team members are 100 dedicated to the squad and have preferably all required expertise to deliver their purpose Squads prioritise their delivery via a backlog, , The Adverse Media Team is working on the service to screen the media and detect if customers should receive a certain risk status This screening is happening continuously, each time a new article is published all customers should be rescreened The global adverse media screening team is delivering their service across different countries all over the world, and sets the global standard, , , , At ING our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business We believe that sustainable progress is driven by people with the imagination and determination to make a better future for themselves and those around them ING is changing what banking can be For you that means plenty of opportunities for personal growth in a continuously evolving environment If this is the environment you thrive in, then apply and join us in changing the future of banking

Atlassian is continuing to hire with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to COVID19 All new and existing Atlassians will continue to work from home until its safe to return to our offices When our offices reopen, every Atlassian will have the choice to work from an office or from home, , Were looking for our newest Atlassian who is driven to help develop Atlassians partner business in Northern Europe Have you worked with channel partners before and want to do it in at a hypergrowth company and in an nonsalesy business model The North EMEA region includes Nordics, Baltics, Benelux and UK  Ireland and is a strong established market with growth potential in all segments including enterprise Atlassians lowtouch model together with our existing channel partners has served us very well, but we also understand that at scale, doing business in this territory requires a stronger local presence To support the continued rapid growth we are growing the Northern EMEA channels team We are seeking a passionate channel specialist that can enable  support our channel partners, as well as assist with onboarding new partners into our flagship partner program The role requires someone who enjoys being challenged to tactically enable and develop our partners, , , , You have at least two years experience working in a channel support or management role You are business savvy, have good problem solving skills and strong attention to detail A strong teammate, you enjoy working with a wide variety of people and roles Youre able to prioritize multiple responsibilities, multitask and work independently, , Were looking for a fast learner with a desire to develop skills to tackle new tasks You have excellent communication skills, and are fluent in English, , Heres an idea of the kinds of things youll get to do, , , , , , , We are actively expanding the number of Channel Partners in the region You will work closely with the regional manager and the team of Channel Managers and Channel Specialists to enable and develop these new partners The team is part of a global organization that is tasked with building a channel that can deliver value to our customers The team works closely with the partner program, enablement and field marketing teams, to develop and deliver programs that suit the needs of our local partners, , The Global Channels team is part of the broader sales team, which has a very unique approach to selling A huge portion of our sales is done via credit card over the web through a selfservice, no negotiation, no discounting model That being said, we have great teams that work directly with customers of all sizes to ensure that they have the information they need to make a decision and be successful in the adoption of our products We believe in transparency and real teamwork, which reflects one of our five values, , , , Whether you work in an office or a distributed team, Atlassian is highly collaborative and yes, fun To support you at work and play we offer some fantastic perks ample time off to relax and recharge, flexible working options, five paid volunteer days a year for your favourite cause, an annual allowance to support your learning  growth, unique ShipIt days, a company paid trip after five years and lots more, , , , Creating software that empowers everyone from small startups to the whos who of tech is why were here We build tools like Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket, and Trello to help teams across the world become more nimble, creative, and alignedcollaboration is the heart of every product we dream of at Atlassian From Amsterdam and Austin, to Sydney and San Francisco, were looking for people who want to write the future and who believe that we can accomplish so much more together than apart At Atlassian, were committed to an environment where everyone has the autonomy and freedom to thrive, as well as the support of likeminded colleagues who are motivated by a common goal to Unleash the potential of every team , , , , We believe that the unique contributions of all Atlassians is the driver of our success To make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status, , All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines, , Learn more about Atlassians culture, interviewing flow, and hiring process by checking out our Candidate Resource Hub

Introduction, As a Business Process Engineer, every day is different One day is devoted to business reporting activities in which you gather information from several data sources such as SAP but also from team leaders You use this information to calculate KPIs and support management in their weekly operations and you see how the factory is managed The next day could be all about your project at Motion, one of ASMLs external production areas You go to their facility and in the morning you prepare for the workshop you are facilitating in the afternoon The aim of your project is to implement a sustainable cost reduction program at one of the work centers using the lean methodology To make your projectsuccessful, you need to keep in mind the interests of all stakeholders from operators to management Other days, you are the independent sparring partner for management when you calculate the required amount of FTE for a certain output plan you receive from the supply chain management department However, the adhoc questions from managers keep you busy as well These requests differ from making an overview of labor hours per type of machine to reviewing some work instructions for standardization of disturbance management processes, , The sector Twinscan Factory in Veldhoven TF FAB is responsible for the production and installation of Twinscan systems The complete production process of the most advanced DUV machines takes place within this sector, , , , As a Business Process Engineer your daily tasks will consist of, , Resource Management, , , , Performance Management, , , , Business Process Management BPM, , , , Improvement projects, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Working environment, You will be working along all levels of the factory, from management to the operators on the shopfloor Some tasks are more routinely and others are projects or adhoc requests, however almost always indepth analysis comes together with people and change Sometimes approaching several deadlines can be stressful, but in the end it is totally worth it when you celebrate the successes with your team, , Your team consists of other business process engineers, project leaders and group leader support This is a team of young, energized and ambitious people who are not afraid of hard work and have one common objective to improve operational processes in the ASML Twinscan factory in Veldhoven, , , , Please submit a cover letter stating your motivation to apply for this role at ASML in addition to your CV

delivery of packages we connect both our customers and our team members to solutions and possibilities Join us in this effort, and discover how we equip and empower our people to deliver exceptional experiences and outstanding service, , , , As a FedEx Human Resources Analytics  Automation Analyst you will maintain and develop reporting solutions for senior management and enable the optimization of HR processes by automation You will be the expert on data processing and data management within the HR function and actively work with our stakeholder teams to promote data management best customers with transportation and business solutions, serving more than 220 countries and territories around the globe We can serve this global network due to our outstanding team of FedEx team activity FedEx takes care of our people they, in turn, deliver the impeccable service demanded by our customers, who reward us with the profitability necessary to secure our future The essential element in making the PeopleServiceProfit philosophy such a positive force for the company is where we close the circle, and return these profits back into the business, and invest back in our people organization environment The Analyst will assist during process improvement meetings and specific incident investigation discussions as needed This role is further expected to support efforts to build a datacentric culture, ensuring that staff and managers have the tools and skills needed to use insights from data and analytics in their program planning, decision making, and organizational innovation, working with the PMA Unit Lead the design, development, planning, validation, and deployment of internal and external reports, dashboards and tools using Power BI and Excel, liaising with the IT Unit where neededMaintain monthly and quarterly performance reporting and data distribution for internal and external audiencesAnalyze and present data in a clear and comprehensible manner both written and verbal and prepare analysis for ongoing and adhoc reporting basis when issues arise or further analysis is neededValidate and monitor the quality of data used for performance management and analyticsSupport operational Units across the organization with their data and analytic requirements and support continuous improvement activitiesAssist Units in managing data, using reporting and analytics tools, and building a datadriven culture, through the use of performance analysis toolsSupport the development of predictive models using machine learning or other models to improve advanced analytics and performance management capabilities to preempt performance shortfallsDocument andor update business processes and manage creation and maintenance of SOPs, Policies and Work Instructions pertaining to PMA functionsRequirementsBachelors degree in computer science, statistics, data science, mathematics, economics, engineering or other fields with a strong background in statistical analysis and or modelling preferred3 years experience with data management, collection, analysis, reporting and visualization requiredAdvanced computing skills in standard software systems, such as Microsoft Word, Excel, Access, and PowerPoint In depth knowledge of business intelligence platforms, such as Power BI, and Tableau Understanding of SQL queries and programming languages, such as Python or R, desiredKnowledge of performance measures, root cause analysis, and continuous improvement desiredBackground, experience, or strong interest in global health, logistics, supply chain strengthening, development andor international work experience with donorfunded programs in diverse environments desiredExperience with continuous improvement initiatives and change management activities desiredProven effective interpersonal skills with client relations experience and an ability to work across disciplines, audiences, and in diverse locations internationally, including written and verbal presentation skillsDemonstrated ability working as part of a team with a diverse set of multidisciplinary professionalsStrong organizational skills, ability to set priorities, work independently, and familiarity with a project management environmentSolution oriented with a high sense of quality, attention to detail, accuracy, efficiency, and meeting tight deadlinesEnglish fluency required including speaking, writing, understanding, and reading with the ability to conduct business in English

Job Title: Senior Business Consultant (Risk Management) Value Proposition
Job Description: Do you see the importance of high quality data Are you driven to properly define the data needs of Risk Management and deliver it together with various business parties within ABN AMRO Do you, like us, have the ambition to structurally bring risk data management to a higher level And do you have good ideas about how this can best be done Then Senior Business Consultant is definitely an interesting position for you, , In this role you can develop yourself in a professional as well as a personal way Tell us your story We are curious, , , , The Senior Business Consultant is the link between the agile delivery teams and the stakeholders in the field of data, process and risk management related issues You deal with complex, especially larger strategic initiatives, form your own opinion and seek alignment with other stakeholders in Risk, Finance, Architecture and IT In addition, you also have an advisory role towards various Risk Management Teams, , You are the first point of contact of the Risk Data  Modelling department for regulatory change or larger internal initiatives You make sure that they land well and on time at the delivery teams You supervise this process That is where your added value lies You challenge, improve or clarify the desired change You act as a risk data point of contact in the change process and you step in if the data quality is under pressure Your field of work lies exactly between Risk Management and Data Management and you work closely together with experts in each of these areas, , As Senior Business Consultant in the field of risk data management you are familiar with BCBS239 and Data Management best practices eg DAMA DMBOK But your work involves more than just translating these policies Your added value is certainly also in the guidance and advice on its practical feasibility You do this by advising, guiding and supporting data users in making better use of data But also by supporting delivery teams in drawing up data requirements and data quality requirements You will contribute to the transition from a report driven to a data driven organization, , Examples of the work and deliveries of a Senior Business Consultant include, , , , , , You will work in the Value Proposition Team VPT This team is part of the Risk Data  Modelling RDM grid RDM is part of the Risk Data  Analytics RDA department which falls under Risk Management The RDM grid consists of approximately one hundred colleagues who share a passion for getting the most out of risk data We do this by improving the risk data, the data systems and the data processes, , The Value Proposition Team is the link between the agile delivery teams and the stakeholders and is responsible for developing, guiding and advising on complex, strategic initiatives in the field of risk management, data and process related issues, , The Value Proposition Team VPT consists of four colleagues with various backgrounds in risk management, data management, business architecture and process  portfolio management The team is driven to bring risk data management to a structurally higher level in an international and dynamic environment, , , , The Senior Business Consultant we are looking for has earned herhis spurs in the areas of risk management, data analytics, data management, data modeling, data architecture andor portfolio management within a banking or financial organization or within consultancy in these areas, , You are an energetic person with a passion for the combination of thinking and doing You know whats going on within Company Description, , Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier and more sustainable From the food you eat, to the water you drink, to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins works with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic and labelling is accurate Eurofins believes it is a global leader in food, environmental, pharmaceutical and cosmetics products testing and in agroscience CRO services It is also one of the global independent market leaders in certain testing and laboratory services for genomics, discovery pharmacology, forensics, CDMO, advanced material sciences and in the support of clinical studies, , In over just 30 years, Eurofins has grown from one laboratory in Nantes, France to over 47,000 staff across a network of more than 900 independent companies in over 50 countries and operating more than 800 laboratories Eurofins offers a portfolio of over 200,000 analytical methods to evaluate the safety, identity, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of biological substances and products, as well as providing innovative clinical diagnostic testing services, as one of the leading global emerging players in specialised clinical diagnostics testing, , In 2019, Eurofins generated total revenues of EUR  456 billion, and has been among the best performing stocks in Europe over the past 20 years, , Eurofins Bio Pharma Product Testing BV is part of the international operating Eurofins The organization is the largest Dutch contract laboratory for the pharmaceutical industry We specialize in analytical tests for bio pharmaceutical raw materials, intermediates and bio pharmaceutical products We perform a very diverse range of analyses for a large number of national and international clients within the bio pharmaceutical industry, , , , , , , , Additional Information, , , This position is based at Business Unit Eurofins NBLSC part of Eurofins PROXY Laboratories BV on the Bio Science Park in Leiden We highly value our strong team spirit and encourage collaboration between colleagues, , Business Unit Eurofins NBLSC offers a wide range of personal and professional possibilities, , , , , Working at the Business Unit Eurofins NBLSC offers you the flexibility and personal touch of working in a medium sized and dynamic company, whilst also allowing you to benefit from having Eurofins as a parent company, , , For questions regarding the position, please contact our the Human Resources Department at 071 524 40 80

FedEx Express is one of the worlds largest express transportation companies and has consistently been selected as one of the top 10 Worlds Most Admired Companies by Fortune magazine Every day FedEx delivers for its customers with transportation and business solutions, serving more than 220 countries and territories around the globe We can serve this global network due to our outstanding team of FedEx team members, who are tasked with making every FedEx experience outstanding, , Our Philosophy, , The PeopleServiceProfit philosophy PSP describes the principles that govern every FedEx decision, policy or activity FedEx takes care of our people they, in turn, deliver the impeccable service demanded by our customers, who reward us with the profitability necessary to secure our future The essential element in making the PeopleServiceProfit philosophy such a positive force for the company is where we close the circle, and return these profits back into the business, and invest back in our people Our success in the industry is attributed to our people Through our PSP philosophy, we have a work environment that encourages team members to be innovative in delivering the highest possible quality of service to our customers We care for their wellbeing, and value their contributions to the company, , Our Culture, , Our culture is important for many reasons, and we intentionally bring it to life through our behaviors, actions and activities in every part of the world The FedEx culture and values have been a cornerstone of our success and growth since we began in the early 1970s While other companies can copy our systems, infrastructure and processes, our culture makes us unique and is often a differentiating factor as we compete and grow in todays global marketplace

Job Description, , For our Sales Support team we are looking for a new colleague for 3240 hours a week in Boxmeer, the Netherlands, , , , Trouw Nutrition Hifeed is the global leader in premixes, protein concentrates, innovative feed specialties and nutritional services for the animal nutrition industry, serving all corners of the world Because we are constantly looking for new opportunities, we have grown a lot in recent years, this has caused that we are now also looking for reinforcement in our Sales Support team, , , , As Sales Support Officer you and the rest of the team ensure that our commercial people can fully focus themselves on the customer and sales You are the point of contact for customers and our suppliers as well for the area sales managers and will be responsible for managing the order process from A to Z, , , , , , , , , , , , , You enjoy independently contacting relations and colleagues You work meticulously and you have good administrative skills We are looking for someone who is creative and thinks out of the box, commercial driven and a team player Always has a positive attitude and takes initiative, , Effective communication and relationship building skills, internally with support functions and externally with key customers and stakeholders Besides that, your personality should be conductive to be an excellent business partner, critical yet constructive coworker and a persuasive colleague, , , , Trouw Nutrition Hifeed offers a supporting role in a professional and growing organization There is a pleasant and informal working environment in which you work within an experienced Sales Support team There is a lot of room for personal initiative and input, , , , , , , , Are you the candidate we are looking for We would like to hear from you You can express your interest in this role by clicking the button apply online and we will contact you as soon as possible For more information regarding this vacancy you can contact Wesley van Dorresteijn Corporate Recruiter on 31613791618 In case you do apply, we like to thank you for sharing your ambition with us, , , , Trouw Nutrition is the global leader in innovative feed specialties, premixes and nutritional services for the animal nutrition industry Trouw Nutrition provides speciesspecific nutritional solutions consisting of feed concepts, products and nutritional knowhow The unique combination of products, models and services Trouw Nutrition offers, boosts productivity and supports animal health through all life stages, contributing to our customers peace of mind Trouw Nutritions nutrition solutions have met the need of farmers and homemixers, feed producers, integrators and distributors Trouw Nutrition has locations in 25 countries and around 5000 employees Our mission is Feeding the Future, , , , Trouw Nutrition is an equal opportunity employer applicants are considered for all roles without regard to race, color, religious creed, sex, national origin, Job Description: De Organisatie, , Onze klant is op zoek naar een vakbekwame support engineer met kennis van Oracle databases Ze noemen zichzelf een slimme ITclub en dat is zeker niet verkeerd als je ruim 20 jaar een specialisme hebt in complexe vraagstukken Ze bieden oplossingen op het gebied van Business Intelligence Oracle en Microsoft, Data Science en Machine Learning en nog veel meer, , Daarbij hebben ze een eigen Academy om jou doorgroeimogelijkheden te garanderen, , Het bedrijf is genomineerd als beste IT werkgever van Nederland Ter uitbreiding van hun team zijn ze op zoek naar een Oracle DBA die graag support wil doen of een bekwame support engineer met kennis van Oracle of SQL databases, , Ben jij diegene Stuur dan je meest recente CV naar click apply, , , , In deze functie ben je medeverantwoordelijk voor het remote beheer van Oracle database omgevingen van haar klanten Je adviseert haar klanten over de nieuwste technologie op het gebied van Oracle en voert opdrachten uit bij de klant op locatie Kennis en ervaring op het gebied van Linux, Windows, Cloud infrastructuur OCI, AWS of Azure en andere databases, zoals PostgreSQL, MS SQL server en MySQL Kennis van PLSQL en shell scripting is daarbij zeker een grote pre, , , , , ,  een afgeronde relevante hbo of universitaire opleiding,  analytisch, hebt oog voor detail en bent nieuwsgierig,  een uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal, zowel in woord als geschrift,  een teamspeler attitude met een proactieve instelling en initiatiefrijkheid,  kennis en ervaring met het uitwerken, installeren, beheren en migreren van netgenoemde omgevingen, zowel in eenvoudige opstellingen als complexe varianten,  kennis en ervaring met onderliggende platformen, zoals Linux en Windows,  kennis van Cloud infrastructuren en andere database platformen is zonder meer een pr, net als kennis van PLSQL en shell scripting, , , , ,  Oneindige trainingen en certificeringen,  Doorgroeimogelijkheden en specialisaties,  Arbeidsvoorwaarden op maat gemaakt met jou alleen,  Leaseauto of vervoersbudget,  Collectieve zorgverzekering,  Marktconform salaris,  Bonusregeling op basis van individuele en bedrijfsprestatie,  Een leuke verrassing, exclusief voor medewerkers en nog veel meer, , Daarnaast zijn er ook leuke meetups waaronder sportevenementen, gameavonden, personeels en gezinsuitjes, etc, Mocht dit iets voor jou zijn, solliciteer gerust
